hwDldpMIB.name: hwDldpMIB

revisions.description: V2.01, added hwDldpIfTable, hwDldpIfNeighbourTable and hwDldpIfStatisticsTable.

hwDldpMIB.contactinfo: Huawei Industrial Base Bantian, Longgang Shenzhen 518129 People's Republic of China Website: http://www.huawei.com Email: support@huawei.com
hwDldpMIB.description: This file is a DLDP-MIB. It provides the functions such as globally enabling or disabling the DLDP protocol, enabling the global alarm, clearing statistics on ports and configuring work mode.

PortIndex.name: PortIndex
PortIndex.description: Each port is uniquely identified by a port number. The port number ranges from 0 to 575.

hwDldpEnable.name: hwDldpEnable
hwDldpEnable.description: Globally enable or disable the DLDP configuration. If the hwDldpEnable is 1, DLDP is enabled. If the hwDldpEnable is 2, DLDP is disabled. By default, DLDP is disabled.

hwDldpUnidirectionalShutdown.name: hwDldpUnidirectionalShutdown
hwDldpUnidirectionalShutdown.description: When the device discovers a one-way link, the shutdown mode of port. The modes include auto and manual. By default, DLDP is auto.

hwDldpWorkMode.name: hwDldpWorkMode
hwDldpWorkMode.description: It configures the work mode of the DLDP protocol, including normal and enhanced mode. By default, the mode is enhanced.

hwDldpAdvertInterval.name: hwDldpAdvertInterval
hwDldpAdvertInterval.description: Global interval for sending advertisement packets for the DLDP configuration. By default, the interval is 5s.

hwDelayDownTimer.name: hwDelayDownTimer
hwDelayDownTimer.description: Global timeout of DelayDown timer. The value rangs from 1s to 5s, By default, the time is 1s.

hwDldpAuthenMode.name: hwDldpAuthenMode
hwDldpAuthenMode.description: Global authentication mode of the DLDP configuration. It has three authentication modes, including none, md5, simple, and sha. By default the authentication mode is none.

hwDldpMd5Password.name: hwDldpMd5Password
hwDldpMd5Password.description: Global md5 password for authentication when authentication is md5.

hwDldpSimplePassword.name: hwDldpSimplePassword
hwDldpSimplePassword.description: Global simple password for authentication when authentication is simple.

hwDldpPortEntry.name: hwDldpPortEntry
hwDldpPortEntry.description: Entries of the DLDP port configuration table.

hwDldpPortIndex.name: hwDldpPortIndex
hwDldpPortIndex.description: It describes enabled DLDP port index. Each port is uniquely identified by a port number. It ranges from 0 to 575.

hwDldpPortStateReset.name: hwDldpPortStateReset
hwDldpPortStateReset.description: It describes the DLDP status of the reset port.

hwDldpPortState.name: hwDldpPortState
hwDldpPortState.description: Port state has eight states, including initial, inactive, active, advertisement, probe, disable, delayDown, and loop.

hwDldpPortLinkState.name: hwDldpPortLinkState
hwDldpPortLinkState.description: Port state has two modes, including up and down.

hwDldpResetStatistics.name: hwDldpResetStatistics
hwDldpResetStatistics.description: It clears the statistics of packets received and sent on the current port.

hwDldpRowStatus.name: hwDldpRowStatus
hwDldpRowStatus.description: Operation of CreateAndGo can be used to create a new instance, and operation of Destroy be used to destroy an existent index. But these operations will not take effect if they are not activated by running the command of activating or setting mib node of hwDldpEnable.

hwDldpNeighbourEntry.name: hwDldpNeighbourEntry
hwDldpNeighbourEntry.description: Entries of the DLDP Neighbour configuration table.

hwDldpNeighbourMacAddr.name: hwDldpNeighbourMacAddr
hwDldpNeighbourMacAddr.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the neighbor information, including MAC address of neighbor. The port may detect multiple neighbors.

hwDldpNeighbourPortIndex.name: hwDldpNeighbourPortIndex
hwDldpNeighbourPortIndex.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the port index of the neighbour.

hwDldpNeighbourPortName.name: hwDldpNeighbourPortName
hwDldpNeighbourPortName.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the port name of the neighbour.

hwDldpNeighbourState.name: hwDldpNeighbourState
hwDldpNeighbourState.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the state of the neighbour, and its value includes unknown, one way, and two way.

hwDldpNeighbourAgeTime.name: hwDldpNeighbourAgeTime
hwDldpNeighbourAgeTime.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the aging time of the neighbor. The aging time is three times the interval for sending advertisement packets.

hwDldpIfEntry.name: hwDldpIfEntry
hwDldpIfEntry.description: Entries of the DLDP interface configuration table.

hwDldpIfIndex.name: hwDldpIfIndex
hwDldpIfIndex.description: It describes enabled DLDP interface index. Each port is uniquely identified by a port number. It ranges from 0 to 62535.

hwDldpIfStateReset.name: hwDldpIfStateReset
hwDldpIfStateReset.description: It describes the DLDP status of the reset port.

hwDldpIfState.name: hwDldpIfState
hwDldpIfState.description: Port state has eight states, including initial, inactive, active, advertisement, probe, disable, delayDown, and loop.

hwDldpIfLinkState.name: hwDldpIfLinkState
hwDldpIfLinkState.description: Port state has two modes, including up and down.

hwDldpIfResetStatistics.name: hwDldpIfResetStatistics
hwDldpIfResetStatistics.description: It clears the statistics of packets received and sent on the current port.

hwDldpIfRowStatus.name: hwDldpIfRowStatus
hwDldpIfRowStatus.description: Operation of CreateAndGo can be used to create a new instance, and operation of Destroy be used to destroy an existent index. But these operations will not take effect if they are not activated by running the command of activating or setting mib node of hwDldpEnable.

hwDldpIfNeighbourEntry.name: hwDldpIfNeighbourEntry
hwDldpIfNeighbourEntry.description: Entries of the DLDP Neighbour configuration table.

hwDldpIfNeighbourMacAddr.name: hwDldpIfNeighbourMacAddr
hwDldpIfNeighbourMacAddr.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the neighbor information, including MAC address of neighbor. The port may detect multiple neighbors.

hwDldpIfNeighbourIfIndex.name: hwDldpIfNeighbourIfIndex
hwDldpIfNeighbourIfIndex.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the port index of the neighbour.

hwDldpIfNeighbourPortName.name: hwDldpIfNeighbourPortName
hwDldpIfNeighbourPortName.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the port name of the neighbour.

hwDldpIfNeighbourState.name: hwDldpIfNeighbourState
hwDldpIfNeighbourState.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the state of the neighbour, and its value includes unknown, one way, and two way.

hwDldpIfNeighbourAgeTime.name: hwDldpIfNeighbourAgeTime
hwDldpIfNeighbourAgeTime.description: When the activated port detects a neighbor, it can record the aging time of the neighbor. The aging time is three times the interval for sending advertisement packets.

hwDldpShaPassword.name: hwDldpShaPassword
hwDldpShaPassword.description: Global sha password for authentication when authentication is sha.

hwDldpPortStatisticsEntry.name: hwDldpPortStatisticsEntry
hwDldpPortStatisticsEntry.description: Entries of the table of the packets sent or received on the DLDP port.

hwDldpPortStatisticsTx.name: hwDldpPortStatisticsTx
hwDldpPortStatisticsTx.description: It describes the number of packets sent on the activated port.

hwDldpPortStatisticsRxTotal.name: hwDldpPortStatisticsRxTotal
hwDldpPortStatisticsRxTotal.description: It describes the number of packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpPortStatisticsRxError.name: hwDldpPortStatisticsRxError
hwDldpPortStatisticsRxError.description: It describes the number of error packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpPortStatisticsRxLoop.name: hwDldpPortStatisticsRxLoop
hwDldpPortStatisticsRxLoop.description: It describes the number of loop packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpPortStatisticsRxValid.name: hwDldpPortStatisticsRxValid
hwDldpPortStatisticsRxValid.description: It describes the number of valid packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpPortStatisticsRxAuthenFail.name: hwDldpPortStatisticsRxAuthenFail
hwDldpPortStatisticsRxAuthenFail.description: It describes the number of authentication failure packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpIfStatisticsEntry.name: hwDldpIfStatisticsEntry
hwDldpIfStatisticsEntry.description: Entries of the table of the packets sent or received on the DLDP port.

hwDldpIfStatisticsTx.name: hwDldpIfStatisticsTx
hwDldpIfStatisticsTx.description: It describes the number of packets sent on the activated port.

hwDldpIfStatisticsRxTotal.name: hwDldpIfStatisticsRxTotal
hwDldpIfStatisticsRxTotal.description: It describes the number of packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpIfStatisticsRxError.name: hwDldpIfStatisticsRxError
hwDldpIfStatisticsRxError.description: It describes the number of error packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpIfStatisticsRxLoop.name: hwDldpIfStatisticsRxLoop
hwDldpIfStatisticsRxLoop.description: It describes the number of loop packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpIfStatisticsRxValid.name: hwDldpIfStatisticsRxValid
hwDldpIfStatisticsRxValid.description: It describes the number of valid packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpIfStatisticsRxAuthenFail.name: hwDldpIfStatisticsRxAuthenFail
hwDldpIfStatisticsRxAuthenFail.description: It describes the number of authentication failure packets received on the activated port.

hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex.name: hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex
hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex.description: It describes the interface index of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.

hwDldpTrapIfName.name: hwDldpTrapIfName
hwDldpTrapIfName.description: It describes the interface name of the activated port that detected one way or found that two way is resumed.

hwDldpTrapFaultReason.name: hwDldpTrapFaultReason
hwDldpTrapFaultReason.description: It describes the reason interface fault.

hwDldpUnidirectionalLink.name: hwDldpUnidirectionalLink
hwDldpUnidirectionalLink.description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected one way. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is the interface index.

hwDldpLinkResume.name: hwDldpLinkResume
hwDldpLinkResume.description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected that unidirectional link was resumed. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is interface index.

hwDldpLoopDetect.name: hwDldpLoopDetect
hwDldpLoopDetect.description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected Loop State. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is the interface index.

hwDldpLoopResume.name: hwDldpLoopResume
hwDldpLoopResume.description: Notify the NMS that the DLDP detected Loop State was resumed. The hwDldpTrapInterfaceIndex node is interface index.

hwDldpCompliance.name: hwDldpCompliance
hwDldpCompliance.description: The compliance statement for SNMP entities which implement the HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB.

hwDldpConfigGroup.name: hwDldpConfigGroup
hwDldpConfigGroup.description: The collection of objects which are used to configure the DLDP implementation behavior. This group is mandatory for agents which implement the DLDP.

hwDldpStatisticsGroup.name: hwDldpStatisticsGroup
hwDldpStatisticsGroup.description: The collection of objects which are used to represent DLDP statistics. This group is mandatory for agents which implement the DLDP and have the capability of receiving and transmitting DLDP frames.

hwDldpPortGroup.name: hwDldpPortGroup
hwDldpPortGroup.description: The collection of objects indicates the information of port.

hwDldpPortTrapGroup.name: hwDldpPortTrapGroup
hwDldpPortTrapGroup.description: The collection of objects indicates that the activated port index detected one way or found that two way is resumed.

hwDldpTrapGroup.name: hwDldpTrapGroup
hwDldpTrapGroup.description: The collection of notifications used to indicate that the HUAWEI-DLDP-MIB data is consistent and indicate the general status information. This group is mandatory for agents which implement the DLDP and have the capability of receiving DLDP frames.
